org.pircbotx.hooks.events

Class DisconnectEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pircbotx.hooks.Event
      • org.pircbotx.hooks.events.DisconnectEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Event>, GenericEvent, GenericSnapshotEvent

    public class DisconnectEvent
extends Event
implements GenericSnapshotEvent
    This event is dispatched when we get disconnected. It is meant for the bot to carry out actions upon disconnection. This may happen if the PircBotX quits from the server, or if the connection is unexpectedly lost.

    Disconnection from the IRC server is detected immediately if either we or the server close the connection normally. If the connection to the server is lost, but neither we nor the server have explicitly closed the connection, then it may take a few minutes to detect (this is commonly referred to as a "ping timeout").

    Author:
    Leon Blakey

      • respond

        @Deprecated
public void respond(String response)
        Deprecated. 
        Does NOT respond to the server! This will throw an UnsupportedOperationException since we can't respond to a server we just disconnected from.
